function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inclusion of studies using mathematical modelling for simulations and predictions may present a risk of bias in the review","Impact":"Misrepresentation of the effects of NPHIs due to reliance on simulated data","Mitigation":"Careful evaluation of the validity and reliability of the mathematical modeling studies before including them in the review","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Reviewers, researchers, and readers of the review","Owner":"Reviewers and researchers"},{"Description":"Exclusion of studies targeting specific populations may lead to a limited understanding of the effects of NPHIs on those populations","Impact":"Inadequate evidence on the effects of NPHIs for specific populations such as patients with cancer or pregnant women","Mitigation":"Consideration of separate analyses or subgroup analyses for specific populations to understand their unique responses to NPHIs","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Reviewers, researchers, and stakeholders interested in the effects of NPHIs on specific populations","Owner":"Reviewers and researchers"},{"Description":"Failure to receive additional information from corresponding authors may result in incomplete data for the meta-analysis","Impact":"Incomplete assessment of the effects of NPHIs due to missing data from studies with incomplete information","Mitigation":"Follow-up communications with corresponding authors to obtain the necessary information for a comprehensive meta-analysis","Technologies":"Communication tools for contacting authors (e.g., email, phone)","People":"Reviewers, researchers, and corresponding authors of the studies","Owner":"Reviewers and researchers"}]}
